column4: Hello! I really wouldn't post here, if i hadn't come up with a very nasty problem. From some time I am having a little bit larger fonts in almost all qt applications. I don't know what to do. I tried configuring it with qtconfig-qt{3,4}, tried deleting the ~/.kde and ~/.qt dirs, the dirs of the programs themselves, nothing helps. But if I login from a different account, everything is ok. Launching from terminal does not show errors. What else c
which distro and which grahpic card do you use?
sorry, i've missed your post. It's ubuntu, a geforce 7, but i don't think that's the problem
